title: Art Therapy - UC Davis Children's Hospital

json.text: Through our therapy groups, patients can interact with their peers, which normalizes their hospital
experience and also have an outlet to express themselves and process difficult emotions
that maybe verbally they're not ready to address yet. Today, we're doing syringe art. They
get to suck up paint in syringes and experiment with medical equipment, which gets this release
of energy, frustration and it's just fun.
